theHighwayman:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

theHighwayman:Bleed.NAME: Bleed
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have gained no additional bleed since last turn, lose #b health

theHighwayman:Ammo.NAME: Ammo
DESCRIPTIONS: The number of times you can use cards that say Fire.

theHighwayman:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, deal 10 damage to the attacking enemy. Scales like an attack card. Clears at end of turn.

theHighwayman:Vigorous.NAME: Vigorous
DESCRIPTIONS: You can stack charges of Ammo

theHighwayman:Cycle.NAME: Cycle of Violence
DESCRIPTIONS: When you take unblocked attack damage, gain X riposte.

theHighwayman:DoubleShot.NAME: Double Barrel
DESCRIPTIONS: The next card you plays that fires is played twice.
